TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 绑定到数据源中的字段的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that is bound to a field in a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的列类型控件来显示数据源中的字段的内容。Use the column type in a control to display the contents of a field in the data source. 单个列中列出了值。The values are listed in a single column. 字段链接到，因此数据源中的任何更新的相应单元中将反映控件。The field is linked to the , so any updates in the data source will reflect in the corresponding cells of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此列类型的默认设置是控件。This column type is the default for the control. 若要控制此列的外观，请使用的样式属性的控件。To control appearance of this column, use the style properties of the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本不是 HTML 编码之前它将显示在。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此列的值是来自用户输入，请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用中的列类型控件来显示数据源中的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use a column type in the control to display the fields in a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例类并将其添加到集合。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class and add it to the collection. summary.span: 获取或设置要绑定到 的数据源的字段名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the field name from the data source to bind to the .

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定要绑定到的字段。Use the property to specify the field to bind to the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源中的字段名称。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field in the data source to bind to the . [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定列中各项的显示格式的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for items in the column.

value.span: 指定列中各项的显示格式的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format of items in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为列中的项提供自定义格式。Use the property to provide a custom format for the items in the column. 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式设置字符串 {0: f2} 显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值仅可以设置为 0，因为在每个单元格只有一个值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要显示中的值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定中列的各种格式控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify various formats for the columns in the control. `Qty`列设置为一个整数，格式，如`Price`列格式化为货币，`Weight`列设置为十进制数的格式和`Expires`列设置为短日期和时间字符串的格式。The `Qty` column is formatted as an integer, the `Price` column is formatted as currency, the `Weight` column is formatted as a decimal number, and the `Expires` column is formatted as a short date and time string. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/cs/BoundColumnSampleCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/vb/BoundColumnSampleVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The value to format.

summary.span: 将指定的值转换为 属性指示的格式。

span.span: Converts the specified value to the format indicated by the property.

returns.span: 已转换为由 属性指示的格式的指定值。

span.span: The specified value converted to the format indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将指定的值转换为格式由属性。Use the method to convert the specified value to the format indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回的字符串值的等效如果未设置属性。This method returns the string equivalent of the value if the property is not set.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可编辑 中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the items in the can be edited.

value.span: 如果不可编辑 中的项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the items in the cannot be edited; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否中的项可以进行编辑。Use the property to specify whether the items in the can be edited. 此属性还可以用于以编程方式确定列是否为只读的。This property can also be used to programmatically determine whether the column is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定是只读的。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a is read-only. .Aspx 文件定义三个 BoundColumn 控件，并将项目列设置为只读的。The .aspx file defines three BoundColumn controls, and sets the Item column to read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/CS/boundcolumnreadonlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/VB/boundcolumnreadonlyvb.aspx#1)]
